          Calculates the hit point between this bounding Box and the ray that is passed.

          Intersects the plane with a ray.
 RayShapeIntersection ShapeNode.intersect(Ray ray)
          Intersects the given ray with the node.
 RayShapeIntersection PhysicsGroup.intersect(Ray ray)
           
 RayShapeIntersection Trackball.intersect(Ray ray)
          Intersects this trackball (sphere) with the given ray and returns either a RayShapeIntersection with .hit set to false or one with the .hitPoint specified as the point where the ray hits the trackball.
 RayShapeIntersection TransformGroup.intersect(Ray ray)
           
 RayShapeIntersection AbstractSceneManager.intersectRayNode(Ray ray)
          Intersects a ray with all the different shapes attached to this sceneManager.
